data.title: Campus Tour â€” Office of Admissions
data.meta_description: We encourage you to explore our beautiful campus at your own pace! Use this as a guide to learn more about the University of Louisville's campus, facilities, history and student life.
data.text:
****Please note, many states have issued self-quarantine advisories for travelers. We ask that students and families to check their state's COVID website prior to their visit for quarantine restrictions and plan accordingly.

Parking will be located on the Visitors Side of the Floyd Street Parking Garage. 9 a.m. - 5 p.m EST, you may proceed to the East side of the Student Activities Center, outside of the Campus Store. Complete the self check-in at the welcome desk and pick up your guide and map.

Use the University of Louisville Campus Map to find your way to each stop.

Although you will be enjoying campus with your own family we ask that you follow these guidelines while on our campus. View full safety procedures for visitors.

If you would like to explore the University of Louisville's campus from home or another off-campus location, please check out our Virtual Tour. And if you haven't already participated in an in-person or virtual campus visit, be sure to schedule one soon! It's the best way to learn about UofL and what awaits you as a Cardinal.

Enjoy the view in the Belknap Academic Building Quad, newly renamed the 2020 Quad in honor of the graduating class of 2020. Remember not to step on Louie the Cardinal if you see him!
